name: Elk_Lighting_Bi-Plane_1-Light_Walnut_Pendant
reviews: This light looks great in our kids rooms

Our first shipment arrived with the glass body of the plane broken. I sent an email to Overstock asking for a replacement and received it within a week. (Excellent customer service!)I purchased this light for my soon to be baby boy's nursery. The light is very unique and I couldn't be happier with it. It is definitely a statement piece.My husband did complain that it was difficult to assemble, but after two days, and a couple deep breaths, the fixture is up and it looks great!
Very pleased with this light! Looks fabulous in our cupola. Best price around!
Such a fun light pendant hanging from our stairwell. easy to set up and install!
description:
Deliver a touch of whimsy or a flight of fancy to almost any space with this plane-themed metal pendant light. This one-light pendant light provides plenty of illumination, and its barnstormer biplane design makes it a great conversation piece that is ideal for sprucing up a child's bedroom or an enthusiast's workshop.
MaterialMetalFinishWalnutNumber of Light1 LightBulb Wattage60 WColorBrownLight DirectionDownlightLighting StyleSpecialtyLighting TypePendantsProduct FeaturesEnergy Efficient
